BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-Scenes
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Description: The Scenes bundle provides functionality for saving, managing, and interpolating between different scenes within the ChimeraX application. It allows users to capture the state of the application at various points and smoothly transition between these states, enhancing the visualization and presentation capabilities of ChimeraX.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Command :: scenes scene :: General :: Save a scene to the sessions scene manager.
ChimeraX :: Command :: scenes restore :: General :: Save a scene to the sessions scene manager.
ChimeraX :: Command :: scenes interpolate :: General :: Interpolate between two scenes.
ChimeraX :: Command :: scenes dInterpolate :: General :: Interpolate between two scenes dynamically.
ChimeraX :: Command :: scenes list :: General :: List current scenes in the log.
